ReadableStreamDefaultReaderReleaseLock.summary: The releaseLock() method of the interface releases the reader's lock on the stream.

remarks.para: If the associated stream is errored when the lock is released, the reader will appear errored in that same way subsequently; otherwise, the reader will appear closed.

If the reader's lock is released while it still has pending read requests then the promises returned by the reader's method are immediately rejected with a TypeError.
Unread chunks remain in the stream's internal queue and can be read later by acquiring a new reader.
